input.sentences: every year we have a parade for our local law enforcements and public safety officials .
representatives from the local fire station are always present .
police officers also show up each year in droves .
this year | i got to drive a police crowd through the parade route .
oddly | a local group of clowns also got to drive through the parade .
output.sentences: Hop on in while the trucks not moving.
Bring in the fire engine for cleaning.
